form.sample_text: The curious young girl, who had never seen such a large, colorful bird before, quickly ran across the busy street, avoiding a few cars and hoping to catch the bus in time for her important meeting.
form.lang_warning_text: The entered text may be in {{language}}

context_menu.instruction: You can now use the extension from the context menu. To analyze parts of speech in the text, highlight a portion, right-click, and select the {{context_menu_item}} option.
